Articles.Content: Hi, not sure if this is the right sub-forum.... but all of a sudden I'm not getting forum emails anymore? Is there a known issue with this ATM? I've double checked, they are NOT ending up my spam filter, all my subs are set to instant/email, not getting PM notifications either. Email addy is correct in profile.

Hi, not sure if this is the right sub-forum.... but all of a sudden I'm not getting forum emails anymore? Is there a known issue with this ATM? I've double checked, they are NOT ending up my spam filter, all my subs are set to instant/email, not getting PM notifications either. Email addy is correct in profile.

Are you saying that an account named CatastrophicFailure is experiencing a... catastrophic failure?

Try removing and then readding your subscriptions, it might be just a glitch, or you might have misfilled your email form, try clearing and resetting that as well.

Hi,

I'm having the same problem with my PM emails. I don't think that it's just Cat...Fail...

Could you send me a PM to test this?

Are you saying that an account named CatastrophicFailure is experiencing a... catastrophic failure?

Try removing and then readding your subscriptions, it might be just a glitch, or you might have misfilled your email form, try clearing and resetting that as well.

No.... no, not catastrophic... definitely more of a mildly obnoxious failure. I've re-added a couple old and a couple completely new subs, verified they're on Instant, still not a peep from the forum in a couple days now.

My inbox is distressingly empty

Hi,

I'm having the same problem with my PM emails. I don't think that it's just Cat...Fail...

Could you send me a PM to test this?

Just sent.
